messages.text: Hi, I'm looking for a 2BHK in Dubai
Great! Any specific area in mind?
Preferably Marina or JVC
What's your budget?
Max 120k. Can we do a site visit this week?
Hello, I saw your ad for the iPhone 15
Yes, we have it in stock. Which color are you interested in?
Blue. What are the specifications?
It has 128GB storage, A17 chip, and 48MP camera
Does it support 5G and wireless charging?
Hi, I bought a laptop from you last week
Hello! How can I help you?
The screen is flickering and making strange noises
I'm sorry to hear that. Can you try restarting it?
I tried that already. It's still not working properly
Hey, the price you quoted for the wedding package is too high
I understand your concern. What budget did you have in mind?
I was thinking more like 50k instead of 80k
Let me see what I can do. We might be able to adjust some services
That would be great. Can you give me a revised quote?
Hi, I submitted my loan application last month
Yes, let me check the status for you
I haven't heard back yet. What's the update?
Your application is under review by our underwriting team
When can I expect a decision?
Hi, I'm interested in Zeldin for our sales team
Great! Zeldin can automatically update your CRM from customer conversations. What channels do you currently use?
We mainly use WhatsApp and email for customer communication
Perfect! Zeldin integrates with both. It monitors conversations in real-time and extracts relevant information automatically
That sounds interesting. What are the technical specifications and integration requirements?
Hello, I attended your demo yesterday about AI agents
Hi! Thanks for attending. How can I help you today?
I'm having trouble understanding how Zeldin learns from our conversations
I can explain that. Zeldin uses AI to analyze conversation patterns and extract key information like contact details, preferences, and deal status
But our current system isn't capturing leads properly. Can Zeldin fix that?
Absolutely! That's exactly what we built it for. It turns unstructured conversations into clean CRM data
Okay, but I'm still not convinced it will work with our complex sales process
